Package com.github.themrmilchmann.mjl.events

Class EventBus.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.themrmilchmann.mjl.events.EventBus.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    EventBus
    public static final class EventBus.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder class for an EventBus.

    A builder is reusable. Calling build() does not reset nor does it invalidate the builder.

    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      • setDispatcher

        public EventBus.Builder setDispatcher​(EventDispatcher dispatcher)
        Sets the dispatcher implementation that will be used by the bus.

        Consecutive calls overwrite the previously set value.

        Parameters:
        dispatcher - the dispatcher for the bus
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given dispatcher is null
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • setSubscriberMarker

        public EventBus.Builder setSubscriberMarker​(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> type)
        Sets the subscriber marker that will be used by the bus.

        Consecutive calls overwrite the previously set value.

        Parameters:
        type - the marker type
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given type is not visible at runtime
